content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Hello, pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I believe that the rental price of 900 Euros per month is quite reasonable, taking into account the 25 square meters of living space and the prime location of the apartment. Would you be interested in discussing this further or would you like to propose a different price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to say that I am a student, dependable and responsible and I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, but I don't want to tell him the facts above. How can I convey this to him?
name: Mary Smith

content: You can convey this to the landlord by expressing your interest in the apartment and stating that you are willing to negotiate on the rental price, but you are looking for a fair and reasonable price that fits your budget as a student. You can also mention that you are a responsible and dependable tenant and are looking for a long-term lease. This way, you can convey your willingness to negotiate while also highlighting your positive qualities as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to ask him if he is open to discussing the rental price.

How can I ask him this?

"Mister Heine, I was wondering if you would be open to discussing the rental price of the apartment with me. I am interested in the apartment but I would like to make sure that the rental price is within my budget before I make a decision. Thank you for your time."
name: Mary Smith

content: Your approach is perfect! It shows that you are interested in the apartment but want to make sure the rental price is within your budget before making a decision. This shows that you are a responsible and intelligent tenant, which can help to build a good relationship with the landlord. Good luck with your negotiation!
name: Heinrich Heine
